result.title: 20 % semi-transparent perovskite cell
result.description: Report on the – solar cell, TCO’s and simulation – development of the 20 % semi-transparent perovskite solar cell demonstrator. End-of-project targets: efficiency above 20 %, 1200 mV VOC, and 90 % transparency (below band gap) at a band gap of 1.6-1.7 eV.

result.title: 10 % small-area CIS cell under NIR
result.description: Report on smallarea CIS solar cell demonstrator 10 efficiency for NIRillumination 20 for 1sun illumination and its stability Efficiency target is 10 215 mAcm2 JSC 600 mV VOC and 78 FF under NIRillumination and 20 43 mAcm2 JSC 600 mV VOC and 78 FF under 1sun illumination Stability target is T80 performance under 1sun at 85 C load for 1000 h Report on approach to reduce root mean square roughness Rt 40 nm for the CIS cell stack

result.title: Development, characterization and performance of antisoiling coating formulations
result.description: Public report of antisoiling layer formulation and application methodology This deliverable will present the different formulations developed and applied based on both grafting or coating methodologies and the results obtained in terms of antisoiling and antistatic capacities as the effect over previous layers and over the cell morphology Means of verification antisoiling performance will be experimentally verified in WP2 determining optical and antistatic properties and in WP5 on fabricated cells using antisoiling coatings Indicator transmittance contact angle and surface resistance of antisoiling coating KPI6 objective transmittance 93 contact angle 110o surface resistance reduction 102 Ohm from SoA PV glass and 10 less of soiling deposition
